Content: { "openapi": "3.0.0", "info": { "version": "1.0.0", "title": "SimpleWorkflowExecutionStateChange" }, "paths": {}, "components": { "schemas": { "AWSEvent": { "type": "object", "required": "version": { "type": "string" } } }, "SimpleWorkflowExecutionStateChange": { "type": "object", "required": ["eventId", "workflowExecutionDetail", "eventType"], "properties": { "workflowExecutionDetail": { "$ref": "#/components/schemas/WorkflowExecutionDetail" }, "eventId": { "type": "number" }, "eventType": { "type": "string" } } }, "WorkflowExecutionDetail": { "type": "object", "required": ["executionConfiguration", "latestActivityTaskTimestamp", "executionInfo", "openCounts"], "properties": { "executionConfiguration": { "$ref": "#/components/schemas/ExecutionConfiguration" }, "executionInfo": { "$ref": "#/components/schemas/ExecutionInfo" }, "openCounts": { "$ref": "#/components/schemas/OpenCounts" }, "latestActivityTaskTimestamp": { "type": "object", "nullable": true } } }, "ExecutionConfiguration": { "type": "object", "required": ["lambdaRole", "childPolicy", "taskPriority", "taskList", "taskStartToCloseTimeout", "executionStartToCloseTimeout"], "properties": { "taskList": { "$ref": "#/components/schemas/TaskList" }, "childPolicy": { "type": "string" }, "executionStartToCloseTimeout": { "type": "string" }, "lambdaRole": { "type": "string" }, "taskPriority": { "type": "object", "nullable": true }, "taskStartToCloseTimeout": { "type": "string" } } }, "ExecutionInfo": { "type": "object", "required": ["parentExecutionArn", "tagList", "execution", "parent", "closeStatus", "executionStatus", "workflowType", "cancelRequested", "closeTimestamp", "startTimestamp"], "properties": { "execution": { "$ref": "#/components/schemas/Execution" }, "workflowType": { "$ref": "#/components/schemas/WorkflowType" }, "cancelRequested": { "type": "boolean" }, "closeStatus": { "type": "object", "nullable": true }, "closeTimestamp": { "type": "object", "nullable": true }, "executionStatus": { "type": "string" }, "parent": { "type": "object", "nullable": true }, "parentExecutionArn": { "type": "object", "nullable": true }, "startTimestamp": { "type": "integer", "format": "int64" }, "tagList": { "type": "object", "nullable": true } } }, "OpenCounts": { "type": "object", "required": ["openDecisionTasks", "openLambdaFunctions", "openChildWorkflowExecutions", "openTimers", "openActivityTasks"], "properties": { "openActivityTasks": { "type": "number" }, "openChildWorkflowExecutions": { "type": "number" }, "openDecisionTasks": { "type": "number" }, "openLambdaFunctions": { "type": "number" }, "openTimers": { "type": "number" } } }, "TaskList": { "type": "object", "required": ["name"], "properties": { "name": { "type": "string" } } }, "Execution": { "type": "object", "required": ["runId", "workflowId"], "properties": { "runId": { "type": "string" }, "workflowId": { "type": "string" } } }, "WorkflowType": { "type": "object", "required": ["name", "version"], "properties": { "name": { "type": "string" }, "version": { "type": "string" } } } } } }
